scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs/api/ --module commonjs --mode modules --name AngularFire2 src
scripts.build_npm: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.publish.es5.json && tsc -p tsconfig.publish.es6.json
scripts.postbuild_npm: cp manual_typings/firebase3/firebase3.d.ts package.json README.md .npmignore dist/ && npm run rewrite_npm_package
scripts.build_bundle: cp -r src angularfire2 && tsc typings/main.d.ts angularfire2.ts --rootDir . --module system -t es5 --outFile dist/bundles/angularfire2.js  --moduleResolution node --emitDecoratorMetadata --experimentalDecorators
scripts.e2e_test: webdriver-manager update && npm run build_e2e && protractor
scripts.build_e2e: rm -rf dist-test && npm run build && tsc -p test/ && cp test/e2e/firebase_object/index.html dist-test/e2e/firebase_object/ && cp test/e2e/firebase_list/index.html dist-test/e2e/firebase_list/ && cp test/e2e/auth/index.html dist-test/e2e/auth/
